RelatedSentence: In another case , a special CBI court in Indore has convicted Rajendra Kumar Arya , then Superintendent working in the Office of Commissioner , Central Excise and Customs and Service Tax , and another person , Manish Pal , in a bribery case .
Arya was sentenced to undergo two years rigorous imprisonment and slapped a fine of Rs 10,000 while Pal was sentenced to undergo one year rigorous Imprisonment .
A fine of Rs 5,000 was imposed on him , it said .

CBI had registered a case on September 9 , 2011 on the basis of allegation that Arya while posted as Superintendent ( Audit ) Service Tax , had demanded a bribe of Rs 50,000 from the complainant for accepting the report of survey department of Central Excise to clear the service tax matter involving his firm .
